a collection of dried plants: A herbarium will contain thousands of sheets of dated, pressed plants.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was collecting plants for the museum's herbarium.She is curator of the Botanical Gardens' herbarium.The herbarium was founded in 1864 by one of the first botany professors in the country.Originally, herbariums served as lending libraries for newly discovered plants.
